meaningMnemonic: Shaving the <radical>hair</radical> off a <radical>geoduck</radical> before you try to eat it is absolutely <kanji>necessary</kanji>. If you don't, the hair will get caught in your throat and you'll choke. It is necessary that you remove the hair.
readingMnemonic: It is also <kanji>necessary</kanji> that you wear a <reading>su</reading>it (す) when eating shaved geoduck. It's a super fancy meal so a suit is necessary for you to enjoy it correctly.
